title: ZTZ Chart
validatemailbox: Please Validate The Email From Your Mail Box
MultipleDevices: The account have been used by more than two devices
tryagain: Couldn't sign up, please try again
Iread: I have read and agree to the

WrongEmailFormat: Email or Password Format NOT Correct

ResetPasswordError: Reset Password Error, Please Try Again
support explain: The market develops in the up trend. Price fall into the support area represents prefering to buy or cut the short position. The color more deep, the supportive from market more strong.
resistance explain: The market develops in the down trend. Price reach the resistance area represents prefering to sell or cut the long position. The color more deep, the resistance from market more strong.
target explain: The predict profit area and the trend (UP or DOWN) might go beyond this area as the market bias is going to be more strong. Please protect your profit as the price is close to this area.
stop lose explain: The market trend does not develop as expected. Please reduce the position as the color become more lighter.
FreeCancel: Free cancel subscription in the Trail period
Further Target explain: After the market breaking the original Target Area, these dashlanes may become the next targets. Please protect your position if you pursue these targets.
Overall explain: As the market develops, the existing signal may change or disappear which means the signal become invalid. Please adjust the positions.
Second Entry explain: The market maintains the trend (UP or DOWN), it is possible to appropriately increase the position at these prices for greater profit. Horever, these position may have higher risk, please trade with caution.
